body:
Vaib,

it's
'-s a', not '-a'
the following work, too:
'-s auto' and '-s Auto' (anything that starts with uppercase or lowercase 'a')

Regards

Axel


On 5 February 2014 17:24, Vaib <vaibhavjain.co at gmail.com> wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] How to get extreme values from a falsecolorimage
